title: TOXIC is it as bad as people say it is?

> What is wrong with this generation of sensitive degenerates. 

What's wrong with your generation of disrespectful ingrates? Why do you all have delusions of grandeur, thinking that they are the best and know what's best? If you can't handle basic decorum, stay off multiplayer games. If you want to scream at other characters, play single player games, then you can scream all you want at your television.

People have been trying to equate this game (and other video games) to sports, but until the same kind of sportsmanship occurs, I hope that this game is always looked down upon. It's not ready for the big leagues.

Because you've heard it before. 

"If you can't say anything nice don't say anything at all."

People who flame and are immature douches in chat generally play like douches and hurt their team too. Not without fail, but there's a pretty strong correlation.

I wish there were more emphasis on punishing players who troll their team through their gameplay rather than saying naughty things, but it's a lot easier for them to pull up chat logs and have proof than trying to determine whether someone is actually toxic or just bad when it comes to their gameplay.

What do you mean by "toxic"? Because "toxic" can be doing things like inting,trolling,griefing,afking -- its not limited to chat.

Gameplay toxicity(inting, trolling etc) is as bad as people say it is. A lot of players are competitive and like winning, so when someone is inting/trolling it makes the likelihood of loosing a lot greater. So its only natural that those players dislike gameplay toxicity.

Chat toxicity is not as bad as people say it is. Simply because there is a mute button and you can ignore verbally toxic text.
